subclusters.subcluster_name: T Cell Immunosenescence and Replicative Senescence Theories
Autoimmunity and Immune Dysregulation in Aging
Neuroimmune Activation and Brain Aging Theories

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: T Cell Immunosenescence and Replicative Senescence Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on replicative senescence of T cells, loss of proliferative capacity, telomere shortening, and exhaustion of adaptive immunity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: T Cell Immunosenescence and Replicative Senescence Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes thymic involution, naive T cell decline, and functional defects in adaptive immunity, emphasizing T cell aging mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: T Cell Immunosenescence and Replicative Senescence Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details replicative senescence in T cells, telomere attrition, and altered costimulatory molecule expression affecting T cell function.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: T Cell Immunosenescence and Replicative Senescence Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on replicative senescence, telomere shortening, and molecular regulation of immune aging in T cells.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: T Cell Immunosenescence and Replicative Senescence Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Centers on thymic atrophy reducing naive T cell output and peripheral T cell senescence impacting immune aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: T Cell Immunosenescence and Replicative Senescence Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes thymic involution, naive to memory T cell shift, and telomere shortening in T cells driving immunosenescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: T Cell Immunosenescence and Replicative Senescence Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses thymic involution, chronic antigenic stimulation, and replicative senescence in T cells as drivers of immune aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: T Cell Immunosenescence and Replicative Senescence Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on chronic viral antigenic stimulation (CMV) driving T cell clonal expansions and immunosenescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: T Cell Immunosenescence and Replicative Senescence Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes HIV-induced premature immunosenescence with T cell senescence and thymic involution.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: T Cell Immunosenescence and Replicative Senescence Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Covers systemic immune decline, immune risk profiles, and persistent infections shaping T cell immunosenescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: T Cell Immunosenescence and Replicative Senescence Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details immune remodeling, immune risk profiles, and senescent T cell accumulation linked to mortality.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: T Cell Immunosenescence and Replicative Senescence Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on T cell population changes, inflammaging, and impaired vaccine responses in elderly.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: T Cell Immunosenescence and Replicative Senescence Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes immune remodeling, inflammaging, and immunosenescence impairing pathogen defense, increasing infection severity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Autoimmunity and Immune Dysregulation in Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes increased autoimmunity, autoreactive B cells, somatic mutations in immune cells, and inflammation driving immune-mediated neuropathies.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Autoimmunity and Immune Dysregulation in Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on immune aging paradox, autoreactive T cells, autoimmune reactions in brain tissue, and neuroinflammation in Alzheimer's disease.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Autoimmunity and Immune Dysregulation in Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes accumulation of autoantibodies, somatic hypermutation, and chronic inflammation driving aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Neuroimmune Activation and Brain Aging Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on microglial activation, immune dysregulation in CNS, impaired clearance of protein aggregates, and neurodegeneration.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Neuroimmune Activation and Brain Aging Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes immunosenescence and inflammaging in CNS, amyloid-beta as immune mediator, and neuroimmune interface dysfunction in Alzheimer's.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Neuroimmune Activation and Brain Aging Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights immune system's role in brain maintenance, protective autoimmunity, neurotrophic regulation, and immune decline causing cognitive loss.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation-Driven Hematopoietic and Immune Stem Cell Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes sepsis-induced premature immunosenescence, HSC aging, SASP, and immune dysregulation exacerbating systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation-Driven Hematopoietic and Immune Stem Cell Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on inflammaging impairing HSC self-renewal, myeloid skewing, and bone marrow niche remodeling.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation-Driven Hematopoietic and Immune Stem Cell Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details inflammation impairing B lymphopoiesis, altered pre-B cell receptor checkpoint, and skewed antibody repertoires.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation-Driven Hematopoietic and Immune Stem Cell Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes DNA damage-induced immune cell senescence, cell non-autonomous senescence propagation, and immune system-driven systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation-Driven Hematopoietic and Immune Stem Cell Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on Otu/Bam deubiquitinase complex regulating intestinal immune homeostasis and longevity via immune signaling modulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation-Driven Hematopoietic and Immune Stem Cell Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Senoinflammation theory linking chronic unresolved inflammation, SASP, metabolic dysregulation, and aging modulation by calorie restriction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation-Driven Hematopoietic and Immune Stem Cell Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes immunosenescence and inflammaging as adaptive processes balancing immune function and contributing to aging-related diseases.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation-Driven Hematopoietic and Immune Stem Cell Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on immunosenescence, inflammaging, and epigenetic/post-translational regulation of immune aging and inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation-Driven Hematopoietic and Immune Stem Cell Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links immunosenescence and inflammaging to frailty and sarcopenia via neutrophil dysfunction and chronic inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation-Driven Hematopoietic and Immune Stem Cell Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: NLRP3 inflammasome activation drives inflammaging, mitochondrial dysfunction, and muscular aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation-Driven Hematopoietic and Immune Stem Cell Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Unresolved inflammation theory emphasizing imbalance of inflammatory responses causing chronic diseases and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation-Driven Hematopoietic and Immune Stem Cell Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes imbalance in arachidonic acid metabolism leading to chronic inflammation and impaired resolution in aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation-Driven Hematopoietic and Immune Stem Cell Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Inflammation-induced endothelial senescence theory linking chronic inflammation, ROS, and vascular aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Exercise-Enhanced Immune Competency Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on exercise improving immune function, delaying immunosenescence, and enhancing vaccine responses.
